other_tests.findings: Special stains of BAL specimens did not reveal cytomegalovirus (CMV), acid-fast bacilli, fungi, or other bacteria.

Diffuse microabscesses involving the bone marrow, lungs, kidneys, heart, thyroid, pancreas, brain, liver, and spleen. Histopathological examination revealed innumerable spherules consistent with disseminated C. immitis.

Diffuse microabscesses involving the bone marrow, lungs, kidneys, heart, thyroid, pancreas, brain, testes, liver, and spleen. Histopathological examination demonstrated innumerable spherules consistent with C. immitis.

other_tests.procedure_name: Premortem BAL Fluid and Blood Cultures

other_tests.date: Before and 1 and 10 months after transplantation.
other_tests.findings: Results were negative for C. immitis.

other_tests.procedure_name: Postmortem Examination of Brain and Basilar Meninges
other_tests.findings: Histopathological specimens revealed multinucleated giant cells containing fungal organisms consistent with C. immitis.
Results were strongly positive for CFAs to C. immitis, at titers consistent with disseminated disease.
